parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.08</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns final, recalculated sub skill value of given unit. (with regard to AI Level coefficient (Difficulty settings)). </value></part><part><name>Description</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit [[skillFinal]] skillName </value></part><part><name>Syntax</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>Parameter 1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> skillName: [[String]] - See [[AI Sub-skills|sub-skill]]. Possible values are:
* aimingAccuracy
* aimingShake
* aimingSpeed
* ''endurance''
* spotDistance
* spotTime
* courage
* reloadSpeed
* commanding
* general </value></part><part><name>Parameter 2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>Return value</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_unitTrueCourage = unit1 [[skillFinal]] "courage";</code> </value></part><part><name>Example 1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[skill]], [[setSkill]], [[setUnitAbility]], [[CfgAISkill]], [[ArmA: AI Combat Modes|AI Combat Modes]] </value></part><part><name>See also</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
